Independence.KCWE: KCWE, virtual channel 29 (UHF digital channel 31), is a CW-affiliated television station licensed to Kansas City, Missouri, United States and also serving Kansas City, Kansas. The station is owned by the Hearst Television subsidiary of the Hearst Corporation, as part of a duopoly with ABC affiliate KMBC-TV (channel 9). The two stations share studio facilities located on Winchester Avenue (along I-435, near Swope Park) in the Ridge-Winchester section of Kansas City, Missouri; KCWE maintains transmitter facilities located at the intersection of East 23rd Street and Topping Avenue in the city's Blue Valley section.
